Package.Name: Alfresco Community on Azure with Bitnami
Package.Description: An Alfresco Community instance deployed to Azure. Integrated with the Alfresco portal and an Angular app starting point for development with Alfresco Application Development Framework (ADF).

Full.Name: Alfresco Community on Azure with Bitnami
